name: Meteor City
description:
Story

You're a lonely fireman, walking up to the sound of meteors crushing your favorite town. As you're equipment allows you to leap buildings and douse fires instantly you're the most capable to protect the city. But what's causing this sudden strange weather? Find out in future content!

Disclaimer

Best played in full screen!
